version_description:
- 诸多错误修复。

如果您有任何反馈和建议，请发送邮件至 hello@waplestuff.com

1. 3D Touch support with Quick Actions.
2. Spotlight Search - Use Spotlight to search your bookmarks.
3. Support for Handoff - Now you can start a calculation on one device and seamlessly resume it on another device.
4. Support for iPad Pro.
5. More UI/UX refinements.

Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)

- Fixed the app crash on certain devices running iOS 8

We are proud to announce Calzy 2.7 with the following update

1. 3D Touch support with Quick Actions.
2. Spotlight Search - Use Spotlight to search your bookmarks.
3. Support for Handoff - Now you can start a calculation on one device and seamlessly resume it on another device.
4. Support for iPad Pro Resolution.
5. More UI/UX refinements.

Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)

We are proud to announce Calzy 2.8 with the following update

- iOS10 Support
- Speed Improvements
- Fixed Some Bugs

Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)

- Added Custom App Icon
- Fixed "Tax -" bug
- Fixed crash on some iPads

Thanks a lot everyone for emailing us your feedback :)
- Bug Fixes
- 修复小错误且提升稳定性
- 修复小错误且提升稳定性
- 修复小错误且提升稳定性
- 修复小错误且提升稳定性
- 修复小错误且提升稳定性

- Support for iOS 12 & watchOS 5
- Support for 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9 inch iPad Pro (3rd generation)
- Support for iPhone XS, iPhone XS max, iPhone XR
- Support for Apple Watch Series 4
- Added “AC” button (Settings > More Options > Show AC Button)
- Added Scientific Rounding
- Various UI/UX enhancements

Thanks for emailing us your suggestions and feedback.

- Minor bug fixes and improved stability
- Added new series 4 apple watch complications
- Various UI/UX enhancements

Thanks for emailing us your suggestions and feedback.

- Added new series 4 apple watch complications
- Various UI/UX enhancements
- Minor bug fixes and improved stability

Thanks for emailing us your suggestions and feedback.
修复小错误且提升稳定性

- Added Apple Pencil 2 support
- Added Group and Decimal Separator customization
- Added AC Button Customisation to Today Widget & iMessage extension
- Added Reciprocal function in scientific calculation
- Added ability to format the Input Expression with thousand separator
- Added ability to sync theme color with the watch app
- Added haptic feedback for numbers
- Fixed Tax Issue in the region with comma as decimal separator
- Fixed Bookmark/History selection issue
- Fixed Bookmark title editing keyboard issue
- Fixed Apple Watch Digital Crown rotation issue

Thanks for emailing us your suggestions and feedback.

- Fixed Rounding Bug

- Fixed Apple Watch Digital Crown rotation issue

Thanks for emailing us your suggestions and feedback.

- Support for iOS 13 with System Dark Mode
- Independent Apple Watch Support
- New dark mode tint for the new Midnight Green iPhone
- Support for new iPhone 11, iPhone Pro, iPhone Pro Max, Apple Watch
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

and lot more enhancements. Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)

- Bug fixes and stability improvements

From Calzy 3.3

- Support for iOS 13 with System Dark Mode
- Independent Apple Watch Support
- New dark mode tint for the new Midnight Green iPhone
- Support for new iPhone 11, iPhone Pro, iPhone Pro Max, Apple Watch

and lot more enhancements. Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)

- Changed widget UI style in sync with default widget style
- Ability to use "Drop" and "Use result" for functions like asin(
- Fixed the bug where doesn’t switch to dark mode when turning on system dark mode
- Various other bug fixes and stability improvements

Thanks a lot for emailing us your feedback :)
